# v0.3.0 / 2015-03-04

* Support ArrayBuffer input.
* Improve performance.

# v0.2.0 / 2015-02-16

* Support byte array input.
* Remove ascii parameter.
* Improve performance.
* Add test cases.

# v0.1.3 / 2015-01-07

* Add bower package.
* Fixed JSHint warnings.
* Add travis.
* Add coveralls.

# v0.1.2 / 2014-07-27

 Fixed accents bug

# v0.1.1 / 2014-01-05

Update license

# v0.1.0 / 2014-01-04

Initial release
